content: I was just tastin' and sniffin' the air, checkin' the smell and humidity to figure out {A笑眯眯}what'll grow best here. It's... my little secret~!

content: I can smell the scent of tasty fresh veggies in the air here mah~! Ahhh, it's such a cozy aroma.

content: While I was wandering about over here mah~, I dug up a lickle bit of dirt with my shovel...

content: {A害羞冒烟}N-No, I wasn't messin' around. I just wanted to check if the soil's fertile enough to grow crops.

content: {A想象}But it ain't from the trees. Feels more like... somethin' grown outta the soil... <style=SizeSmall>I wonder what other crops are growin' here.</style>
